title: Commercial Building Energy Efficiency Audit
description: An energy consultant is preparing a preliminary energy efficiency report for a commercial office building.

tasks.description: Analyze the building's hourly electricity consumption data for the past 12 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies peak usage times and baseline energy consumption.

tasks.description: Benchmark the building's Energy Use Intensity (EUI) against similar buildings in the same climate zone.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines if the building is more or less efficient than average.

tasks.description: Recommend three high-impact energy conservation measures (e.g., LED lighting retrofit, HVAC optimization, solar installation) with estimated costs and payback periods.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a prioritized list of actionable recommendations.
